subdisciplines.name: Religious sociology of the Middle East
subdisciplines.description: The study of the religions and their intersection with society, culture, economics and politics in the Middle East.

subdisciplines.name: Cultural Sociology of Religion
subdisciplines.description: The study of how religion shapes cultural practices and beliefs.

subdisciplines.name: Religious Change and Conflict
subdisciplines.description: The study of how religions change over time and how they interact with each other in situations of conflict.
